extendedInfo.description: Manage your online brokerage account from virtually anywhere. This free myStreetscapeÂ® Brokerage Mobile application lets you view your positions and monitor your portfolio right from the palm of your hand.myStreetscapeÂ® Brokerage Mobile allows you to:- Get access to your accounts and positions virtually anytime- Check your account balances- View account history- Create watchlists                                                                                              About myStreetscape Brokerage Mobile: - The myStreetscape Brokerage Mobile application is a third-party brokerage account management tool available for use by customers of participating financial institutions.  - To use the myStreetscape Brokerage Mobile application, you must have an active myStreetscape or Online Brokerage account with your participating financial institution.- For more information about enrolling in myStreetscape or Online Brokerage, please contact your broker or advisor.The images below are for illustrative purposes only.National Financial Services LLC, Member NYSE, SIPC. myStreetscape is a registered service mark of FMR LLC.

reviews.title: Random close
reviews.comment: Droid bionic.  Will not stay up long enough to even look at current positions
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app needs a lot of work.
reviews.comment: Features are limited, randomly closes, preferences do not exist, and the interface is a challenge.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot log in
reviews.comment: The app will not accept a User ID longer than 10 characters.  My User ID is 11 characters long so I am out of luck.  I cannot log in.  This needs to be fixed. Running on Moto Atrix MB860
reviews.author: Michael Feinstein

reviews.title: Fine
reviews.comment: Works excellently on the gs3. It is easier to use than the web page.
reviews.author: A Google User
